root.name: Professor Fizzwizzle
root.description: Take one of three roads (difficulties) on the way to save the professor from his own creation.Puzzles includes pushing crates, shooting stuff, freezing, melting, portals (yeah) triggers, luring robot and more.On your way to helping the professor save himself, you unlock various photos of the professor and his inventions.

similar_games.game: Professor Fizzwizzle and the Molten Mystery
